patthana23.4:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana23.4:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.4:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
